game.name: Burger Rush Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Burger Rush Simulator는 패스트푸드 시뮬레이터로, 레스토랑을 관리하고, 공급품을 주문하고, 용기를 재고하고, 계산대와 드라이브스루에서 결제를 받으며, 주문을 준비하고, 직원을 고용하며, 주방과 식사 공간을 확장합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Burger Rush Simulator is a fast food simulator where you manage your fast food restaurant, order supplies, restock containers, take payments at checkout and drive-thru, prepare meals, hire staff, expand your kitchen and dining area, and unlock features like storage and touchscreen checkout.
